page.title: 14THE MUSEUM
page.content: The museum was built in 1911.It was first a library until some men dug up Castle-collen.The men found some Roman things that they used to fight with. When the men came back with the artifacts the librarians got together and had a little meeting. After that they decided to change the library into a museum.The existence of the "Old boat" in the River Ithon at a point north of Llandrindod Wells had been known of for some time,but it was not until the summer of 1929,when the water was unusually low,that arrangements were made to remove it from the water or river. This was done on the 19th of August 1929.The most delicate thing in the museum was the banner.The banner was hung up to celebrate 60 years of Queen Victoria on the throne.
